alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Box Butte, southwestern Dawes and east central Sioux Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 513 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Chadron Campground to 12 miles northeast of Agate Bed National Monument. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crawford, Fort Robinson Campground, Chadron Campground, Box Butte Campground, Red Cloud Campground, Box Butte Dam, Marsland, Fort Robinson and Chadron St Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux
